channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: 'Lightweight, razor-sharp, and budget-friendly' — why I’m not taking the Viltrox 85mm f/2 EVO off my camera
item.description: The Viltrox 85mm f/2 EVO is another outstanding lens - I sincerely hope Nikon doesn't ban the upstart brand from the Z Mount.

item.title: 'The tiniest autofocus lens I've played with in over 15 years of testing camera gear' – the cheap Viltrox body cap full-frame lens is surprisingly sharp and has bags of character, but it makes even more sense for APS-C
item.description: I paired the Viltrox AF 28mm f/4.5 lens with a full-frame Nikon mirrorless camera, and was surprisingly fond of the tiny and cheap optic

item.title: There's a sneaky way to watch UFC 325 for FREE
item.description: We uncovered a sneaky way to watch UFC 325 for free — without splashing all your cash on a Paramount+ subscription.
